articles.author: Shreyashi Sanyal, Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia stocks track Wall Street gains as softer-than-expected U.S. jobs data fuels rate cut hopes - CNBC
articles.description: Investors await the Reserve Bank of Australia's rate decision on Tuesday and China's April trade data on Thursday.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets tracked Wall Street gains on Monday as a softer-than-expected U.S. jobs report fueled hopes that the Federal Reserve could start cutting rates soon.
